bonzai.api

Interface Farmhand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity, OwnedEntity

    public interface Farmhand
extends OwnedEntity
    Farmhands are your eyes and ears on the battlefield. These are the only entities under your direct control.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • move

        FarmhandAction move(Position position)
        This creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. The farmhand will attempt to move to the tile. It is invalid to attempt to move to a non-adjacent position. Attempting to move off the map or on to an impassable tile is valid but will result in stumbling the farmhand.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to attempt moving to
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • move

        FarmhandAction move(int x,
                  int y)
        This creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. The farmhand will attempt to move to the given coordinates. It is invalid to attempt to move to a non-adjacent position. Attempting to move off the map or on to an impassable tile is valid but will result in stumbling the farmhand.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to move to
        y - the y coordinate to move to
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • shout

        FarmhandAction shout(String words)
        This creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. The sentence will be trimmed to ~20 characters and the farmhand will say the given words. The farm hand will raise his voice depending on the exclamation points and capital letters.
        Parameters:
        words - for the Farmhand to say
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface

      • pickUp

        FarmhandAction pickUp(Entity item)
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. The Farmhand will attempt to grab the passed in entity. It is invalid if the entity is not adjacent to the farmhand or is null. If multiple farmhands attempt to pick up the same entity the action is valid; one farmhand will succeed and the rest will fail and stumble.
        Parameters:
        item - the object to try picking up
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • dropItem

        FarmhandAction dropItem(Position position)
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. The Farmhand will attempt to set down the farm hand's item. It is invalid if the farmhand is not carrying an item. If a farmhand attempts to drop an item to a location where that item can not exist the item will remain in the farmhand's possesion.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to set down the item at
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • purchase

        FarmhandAction purchase(Item.Type item)
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. Attempts to purchase the passed in item type. Only works if on base tile. Eggs cannot be purchased. It is invalid to attempt to purchase an item when not adjacent to your base tile. This action may fail if there is insufficient money to purchase the item.
        Parameters:
        item - the item type to purchase
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • sell

        FarmhandAction sell()
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. Sells the item currently in the Farmhand's possession. Its invalid to attempt to sell an item when not adjacent to your base tile. Its also invalid to attempt to sell nothing, as that stands in defiance of capitalism.
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • useItem

        FarmhandAction useItem()
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. Uses the currently held item. As this method does not take a position it is only valid for duck calls. It is invalid to use this method when the farmhand is not holding a duck call.
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • useItem

        FarmhandAction useItem(Position target)
        Creates a FarmhandAction that can be passed into the AI interface. Uses the currently held item on the given position. This method is only valid for pitchforks and buckets.

        When a pitchfork is empty you may use it on a base tile to purchase straw or you may use it on a strawbale to obtain the straw. When a pitchfork is full you may use it on a base tile to sell the straw or you may use it on a mud or dirt tile in order to produce a dirt or strawbale tile, respectively.

        When a bucket is empty you may use it on a water tile to obtain water. When a bucket is full you may use it on any tile -- dirt will turn in to mud. Otherwise the bucket will be emptied without effect.

        Parameters:
        target - the target to use the item on
        Returns:
        FarmhandAction for the AI interface or null if the action is invalid

      • getHeldObject

        Entity getHeldObject()
        Returns:
        the object in the farmhand's hand, otherwise null if the farmhand is not currently holding an object

      • isStumbled

        boolean isStumbled()
        Returns:
        true if the farmhand is stumbled, otherwise false

      • getLastAction

        FarmhandActionResult getLastAction()
        Returns:
        the result of the action taken last turn, otherwise null if no action was taken last turn
